mentionedBy.name: PTC Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Teamcenter is widely used comprehensive end-to-end PLM solution. Siemens NX is enterprise-grade CAD that scales well with strong PLM integration. The NX + Teamcenter combination offers deep native integration for complete CAD-PLM ecosystem.
